1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, the gang's all there. Ross has a slip of paper that he throws onNEWLINEthe ground tying to get Rachel's attention.

lines.Line: (picking up the slip of paper) Hello! What's this? Oh right its thatNEWLINEgirl's phone number. (Rachel ignores him) Yeah-yeah, there it is, just a phone number aNEWLINEreally hot girl gave me. (He holds it so that Rachel can see it, she continues to ignoreNEWLINEhim) It's no big deal, I mean it is her home phone number, but...(Rachel still ignoresNEWLINEhim) Whoa! (Throws it in her lap) Whoa-whoops, I almost lost this baby! Yeah, the lovelyNEWLINEAmanda gives me her number and I-I go and drop it. (He waves it in front of Rachel's face.NEWLINEThen suddenly Phoebe has to sneeze and Rachel quickly grabs the slip of paper and gives itNEWLINEto Phoebe for her to sneeze into.

2.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is walking into the living room having justNEWLINEgotten up in the middle of the night.

lines.Line: (sees Kathy is up watching TV) Hi
Jeez, at 2:30 in the morning, I didn't expect to have to fight overNEWLINEthe remote
I'm sorry, it's just this Ernie Cofax thing on in a few minutes I wantedNEWLINEto watch
Oh my God! That's why I got up too
Oh my God! That's why I got up too
Oh my God! That's why I got up too
You're kidding! Oh, I love him
Hey, listen, I'm sorry about this afternoon, y'know, if I would'veNEWLINEknown you guys were... I never would've..
So ah, Joey tells me you two met in acting class
Yeah, they teamed us up as partners. Joey picked three scenes for us toNEWLINEdo; all of them had us making out
That's a good thing actually, because ah, he used to have me rehearseNEWLINEwith him
That's a good thing actually, because ah, he used to have me rehearseNEWLINEwith him
No, but this wonder broom is amazing
No, but this wonder broom is amazing
Hey! (Runs over and gets his wonder broom

lines.Character: (Chandler jumps into the canoe and sits down. The chick starts chirping and ChandlerNEWLINEreaches down to pick him up
lines.Line: Chandler jumps into the canoe and sits down. The chick starts chirping and ChandlerNEWLINEreaches down to pick him up.

3.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe and Monica are there.

lines.Line: So, I need to write some depressing stuff to go along with my new floozyNEWLINEvoice, but nothing that sad has ever really happened to me
Oh umm, how about your mom dying, or having to live on the streets whenNEWLINEyou were 14
Uh-huh. Oh, yeah, I could write about the time my hair did thatNEWLINEWoo-hoo thing
(loudly) So I'm going over to Amanda's tonight

Great, actually. I'm thinking tonight, maybe the night. Yeah, I mean ah,NEWLINEthe kids are gonna play together and then when they're asleep, I'm thinking Amanda and INEWLINEbreak open a bottle of wine, and do a little playing ourselves
(entering, with a guy) Hi guys! This is Josh. Josh, these are myNEWLINEfriends, and that's Ross
So, did you play in college? (She points to his NYU Soccer (football forNEWLINEthe rest of the world) sweatshirt he's wearing.
Oh, I still do. Next year, I hope to make varsity though
Oh, I still do. Next year, I hope to make varsity though
Ross, didn't you ah, play soccer in High School? Oh no wait, that'sNEWLINEright. You just organized their game schedules on your Commodore 64
Well, it's getting late, I've got to get to the game, so I'm gonna...NEWLINEhead
Okay. (He starts to leave, and Rachel grabs him and gives him aNEWLINEpassionate kiss.) I'll miss you
I know, isn't he great? It's so nice to finally be in a funNEWLINErelationship, y'know? There's nothing boring about him, and ah, I bet he's never set footNEWLINEin a museum
Well maybe he'll get to go soon, like on a class trip or something
Y'know what else is really great about him, oh, what is the word for theNEWLINEadult that doesn't have dinosaur toys in their bedroom

It's this dumb thing that Ross made up `cause he was trying to fool ourNEWLINEparents. It's a way of giving the finger, without actually having to give it. I remember INEWLINEcried the night you made it up, `cause it was the first time that I realized that I wasNEWLINEactually cooler than my older brother
Well, I'm gonna go get ready, (Gives Monica the fist thing.) for my dateNEWLINEtonight, so ah, I'll just_ head

Yeah, I should go to, `cause I'm playing in one hour. Hey, (clears herNEWLINEvoice and in her normal voice) you guys should come hear me, ooh hear me. Ooh, (tries toNEWLINEsing) My sticky shoes--eww! Eww! I lost my sexy phlegm

4.SceneDescription: A street, Chandler is buying a newspaper and notices Kathy running by.

lines.Line: Kathy! Kathy! Hi!! Kathy! Kathy! (She doesn't hear him and keepsNEWLINErunning, Chandler starts chasing her as the theme to The Mod Squad starts toNEWLINEplay. First, a car almost hits him and then gets mustard splashed on him as he runs by aNEWLINEhot dog vendor.) Kathy! (He keeps running and gets tangled up in the leashes of five dogs,NEWLINEin desperation he throws his paper.) Fetch! Fetch it! (He frees himself and resumes theNEWLINEchase) Kathy! Kathy! Kathy! (He now trips and falls into a pile of garbage, he tries toNEWLINEget up and scream her name again but he has a piece of spinach in his mouth. He gets outNEWLINEof the garbage and starts crossing the street by running over the hoods of a couple ofNEWLINEcabs.) Kathy! (He jumps in front of her and out of breath he says) Kathy
Hey, Chandler! What are you doing here
Hey, Chandler! What are you doing here
Oh, I just wanted to say, Hey
Okay. (He walks away disgusted with himself.

5.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is playing Hide-and-Go-Seek with the chick andNEWLINEthe duck.

lines.Line: 99...100! Ready or not, here I come! (He opens his eyes and sees thatNEWLINEthe chick and the duck are still sitting in front of him) All right, let's go over theNEWLINEconcept one more time
Hey guys. (to Chandler) Listen uh, you wanna get some dinner with me andNEWLINEKathy tonight
Ohh, umm, y'know what, I already ate
Ohh, umm, y'know what, I already ate
Y'know I had a big meal on Monday, y'know. So that's just gonna get meNEWLINEstraight through the week
Okay, I see what's going on here
Okay, I see what's going on here

Yeah, you've been avoiding her ever since we started going out. Look, INEWLINEmade an effort to like Janice, now I think it's your turn to make anNEWLINEeffort to like Kathy by going out to dinner with us. Right
Good, and hey! My treat. (He turns to go into his bedroom then stops.) ButNEWLINEthat's only because you're not eating anything, right

6.SceneDescription: A nightclub, Chandler is having dinner with Kathy and Joey.

lines.Line: Ohh, God, guys, check it out, you can see that girl's underwear
(to Chandler) So? Huh? What do you think
(to Chandler) So? Huh? What do you think
Ohh, she's-she's not really my type
Y'know what I think it is? It's the fishnet stockings. Y'know?NEWLINEWhenever I see a girl in fishnet stockings it reminds me of my father in fishnetNEWLINEstockings
Okay. Understanding a little more why you're single. Ohh! Y'know, I haveNEWLINEa friend you would like, she's really pretty. And then we could double date
Okay, I've got some ugly friends, and they're all available too
Listen, I-I'm gonna grab a beer. (Leaves
Listen, I-I'm gonna grab a beer. (Leaves
(to Kathy) I'll be right back. (to Chandler) What was that
Kathy was being really nice and you just walked away. I thought we had aNEWLINEdeal
Hey, look, what do you want from me
Hey, look, what do you want from me
I want you to like her! But if that's too damned difficult for you, thenNEWLINEthe least you can do is pretend

Okay, what do you saw I go over there and say how much I like her?NEWLINE(Joey gives him a thumbs up) No-no it'll be good, I can tell her much I've been thinkingNEWLINEabout her. That I haven't stopped thinking about her since the moment I met her. That I'mNEWLINEso fantastically, over-the-top, wanna-slit-my-own-throat in love with her, that for everyNEWLINEminute of every hour of every day I can't believe my own damn bad luck that you met herNEWLINEfirst!
Well, that's pretty good. But you might wanna tone it down a little
Well, that's pretty good. But you might wanna tone it down a little

7.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is there with her guitar.

lines.Line: (singing) Platting goats are platting. Platting down the street.NEWLINEPlatting goats are platting, leaving little treats. (to Gunther) Does it even workNEWLINEwithout my sexy voice

lines.Character: (Phoebe grabs Gunther and kisses him. He then falls to the couch in shock
lines.Line: Phoebe grabs Gunther and kisses him. He then falls to the couch in shock.

8.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Monica, with a blanket draped over her shoulders, opensNEWLINEthe door to a similarly clad Chandler.

lines.Line: Can I sleep on your couch
